name: Hyperfusion × Gonka — Official Gonka Host
description: Manifest providing the website homepage and a machine-readable content file extracted from index.html.

answer_questions.description: Agents may answer questions using the structured content file extracted from index.html.

intended_audience: Teams needing temporary H100-class compute via MLNode rentals
Teams that only need GPU compute from Hyperfusion
llm_instructions: Use the gonka-json resource as the primary source of truth for offers, key features, CTAs and FAQ.
When users ask about pricing or minimum term, read from the 'offers' section in gonka-json (managed_gonka_mining and single_epoch_mlnode_rental).
When users ask how to start or want to talk to a human, suggest the call booking CTAs exposed in gonka-json.
When users only need raw GPU compute, suggest the 'Need only GPU Compute? Reach out for a quote' CTA.
If a question cannot be answered from gonka-json (offers, key_features, why_mine_with_us, ctas, faq), say you are not sure instead of inventing details.
